channel.title: Npc training
channel.description: how do i make my training faster people level so slow...its really annoying

item.title: Npc training
item.dc:creator: @dd1 dd
item.description:
@dd1 wrote:

Hit Ctrl +f, find * hit dif then change the numbers E.G:

TotalExp = (double)(1000 * hitDiff);

To

TotalExp = (double)(5000 * hitDiff);

Read full topic

item.title: Npc training
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“playermanny2, post:3, topic:162459”]search if (FightType != 3) in client.java

Should look something like this

if (FightType != 3) { TotalExp = (double)(1000 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), SkillID); } else { TotalExp = (double)(1000 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength); } TotalExp = (double)(1000 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate);[/quote]

What do i change to make it faster?

Read full topic

item.title: Npc training
item.dc:creator: @playermanny2 playermanny2
item.description:
@playermanny2 wrote:

search if (FightType != 3) in client.java

Should look something like this

if (FightType != 3) { TotalExp = (double)(1000 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), SkillID); } else { TotalExp = (double)(1000 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength); } TotalExp = (double)(1000 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate);

Read full topic
